Summary: We seen these bright light red and orange like light in the sky coming from the SE there where 6 to 8 of them
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were down the street from our house lighting off fireworks at a friends house it was darker there than our place. Well I was lighting the fireworks when my friend said look up there what is that?! My wife looked up and said what are those things flying I then looked at where they were looking and there they were these bright lights,they were in a line. The would disapear then it would be back then one would brake off from the rest darting from left to right then up down it did this 2 to 3 times then I said to my wife get your cell phone out and get this she said she was already doing it we watched it for a bit longer.we dident know what we had seen I was shocked all I could do was look at it them. There was 7 of us there wondering what was it then it, they were gone
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Port Angeles
There were no other sightings in Port Angeles on or around July 4th 2013
